titles.title: Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park Expansion Act of 2005
To extend the boundary of the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park in the State of Hawaii.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 7/28/2005--Introduced. Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park Expansion Act of 2005 - Extends the boundary of the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park in Hawaii.
